name: Wind Boys!
storyline:
Players will play as a new high school teacher in Kanazawa. The all-boys high school was once known as a strong competitor in Wind Instrumental Club, but the club is now disbanded. You try to revive its glory and luckily, you have found lots of talented musicians in the school…

You can not only train the young musicians through practice, but also hold concerts for your characters. You can also customize My Board with your own designs and share it with your friends.
summary: Wind Boys! is a smartphone and PC browser game under the theme of brass band x high school boys x youth announced in October 2018. Illustrator Natsuko is credited as the character designer, and Hideki Sakamoto, who worked on Bungo to Alchemist, is in charge of music.
